original_title: Dispatch: Zimbabwe - Live at Madison Square Garden
overview: Dispatch Zimbabwe documents this unprecedented three-night benefit event reuniting members of Dispatch for a weekend around a cause. The music world was rocked when Dispatch became the first independent band to sell-out the legendary arena (three nights no-less)! More importantly, they proved the healing power of music as the band and fans collectively raised funds and awareness for poverty stricken Zimbabwe.
title: Dispatch: Zimbabwe - Live at Madison Square Garden
